name: C & M DEVELOPERS, INC., Petitioner v. BEDMINSTER TOWNSHIP ZONING HEARING BOARD, Respondent
name_abbreviation: C & M Developers, Inc. v. Bedminster Township Zoning Hearing Board

parties: C & M DEVELOPERS, INC., Petitioner v. BEDMINSTER TOWNSHIP ZONING HEARING BOARD, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 21th day of September, 2001, the Order dated September 6, 2001 denying the Petition- for Allowance of Appeal is hereby WITHDRAWN, due to administrative error, pending further Order of this Court.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
784 A.2d 1276
C & M DEVELOPERS, INC., Petitioner v. BEDMINSTER TOWNSHIP ZONING HEARING BOARD, Respondent.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Sept. 21, 2001.
